library(leaflet)

leaflet() %>%
  setView(lng = -79.442778, lat = 37.783889, zoom = 12) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron)
 
# add points

library(leaflet)
 
lex <- data.frame( lat    = c(37.789444 , 37.787673  ,  37.785624  )
                 , lon    = c(-79.441725, -79.443623 , -79.441544  )
                 , place  = c("Lab"     , "Classroom", "Thai food!")
                 , rating = c(7         , 5          , 10          )
                 , stringsAsFactors = FALSE
                 )
leaflet() %>% setView(lng = -79.442778, lat = 37.783889, zoom = 12) %>% 
  setview()
  addTiles(data = lex) %>%
  addCircleMarkers(radius = ~rating, lable, label = ~place)
